title: How to make my SD card as a default storage of Google Play - Quora

response.answer_text: Dear Ibrahim you have requested me that how do i make my SD card as a default storage of Google play?. As far as I'm concerned that below jot down instruction may be different and different smart phones. But keep searching you will definitely will find out the proper way. Go To Device 'Settings' –> Scroll down and tap on 'Developer options' –> Scroll Down and enable 'Force allow apps on external'. This makes any app eligible to be written to external storage.... Open Setting App.Click on Storage option.Click on the SD card option.Click on Option Menu.Click on Format as Internal.if you like my comments do not forget up vote, share, follow the question and also follow my profile “Sameer Ahmed”. Your kind action is always appreciated.

Firstly, you need root. Secondly, mount the SD Card as Internal Storage and vice-versa. But this is dangerous! You should now never take the SD Card out unless you remount them back how they were and unmount the SD Card or simply turn off the phone!
